keywords.value: National Center on Addiction and Substance Abuse
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The practice of consuming marijuana extract — a yellow, waxy substance — appears to have risen rapidly in New York City over the past few years, law enforcement officials say.

headline.print_headline: Chasing Bigger High, Marijuana Users Turn to a Yellow, Waxy Extract
headline.main: Chasing Bigger High, Marijuana Users Turn to ‘Dabbing’

snippet: The practice of consuming marijuana extract — a yellow, waxy substance — appears to have risen rapidly in New York City over the past few years, law enforcement officials say.
abstract: Medical experts have begun warning of potential dangers of concentrated marijuana extract that has gained popularity among youth; while federal law enforcement agencies are aware of growing popularity of substance, New York City Police Dept has no record of confiscations of substance.
